decision_conditions:
We have amended description of development, please confirm you agree?
'Construction of new 2 bed dwelling to rear of 39 Second Cross Road. (Variation of condition 2 ‘approved plans and drawings’ of planning appeal APP/L5810/W/22/3298282 dated 28th September 2023, application reference 22/0252/HOT, to make the following changes:
- Removal of two windows and reduction in the size of the first-floor window on the northwest elevation (Chestnut Road).
- Removal of the entrance door and porch from the side (east) elevation.
- Installation of a new entrance door and double height glazing on the southeast elevation.
- Revision to the size and position of the first-floor window on the southeast elevation.)'
